summary: During a chess tournament, grand master Peter is suspected of murdering Debi after sex. He helps the police as the murders continue.
cast: Codie Lucas Wilbee|Joshua Murray|Frank C. Turner|Don Thompson|Megan Leitch|Christopher Lambert|Alex Diakun|Ferdy Mayne|Katharine Isabelle|Mark Wilson|Kehli O'Byrne|Daniel Baldwin|Tom Skerritt|Blu Mankuma|Monica Marko|Walter Marsh|Charles Bailey-Gates|Arthur Brauss|Suzy Carby|Sam Malkin|Diane Lane|Elizabeth Baldwin|Dwight McFee|Pat Bermel|Elizabeth Barclay|Rebecca Toolan|Aundrea MacDonald|Freda Perry|Holly Chester|Marilyn Norry|Donna Yamamoto|Tom Heaton|Rachel Hayward|Kymberly Sheppard|Deryl Hayes
title: Jaque al asesino
